message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its value to you, we believe it's worth $14000. We're confident this price reflects the quality and utility of the product, while also ensuring you receive a fair deal. We look forward to your response.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. However, my budget is limited, and I'm only able to offer $12500 at this time.  This price reflects the value I place on the product and is the maximum I can afford.  I'm hoping we can find a mutually agreeable solution.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to meet halfway. In light of that, I would like to propose an offer of $13000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your budget while still reflecting the product's true value. I look forward to your consideration.
